GSP30partr_au:0: PADA MARKERS For a four-pada verse:
GSP30partr_au:2: śrīdevī uvāca anuttaraṃ kathaṃ deva $ sadyaḥkaulikasiddhidam &
GSP30partr_au:4: etad guhyaṃ mahāguhyaṃ $ kathayasva mama prabho &
GSP30partr_au:5: hṛdayasthā tu yā śaktiḥ % kaulinī kulanāyikā // ParTri_2 //
GSP30partr_au:6: tāṃ me kathaya deveśa $ yena tṛptiṃ labhāmy aham &
GSP30partr_au:7: śrībhairava uvāca śṛṇu devi mahābhage % uttarasyāpy anuttaram // ParTri_3 //
GSP30partr_au:8: yad ayaṃ kauliko vidhir $ mama hṛdvyomny avasthitaḥ &
GSP30partr_au:9: kathayāmi na saṃdehaḥ % sadyaḥ kaulikasiddhidam // ParTri_4 //
GSP30partr_au:13: kramāt kādiṣu vargeṣu % makārānteṣu suvrate // ParTri_6 //
GSP30partr_au:17: amūlā tatkramā jñeyā $ kṣāntā sṛṣṭir udāhṛtā &
GSP30partr_au:18: sarveṣāṃ caiva mantrāṇāṃ % vidyānāṃ ca yaśasvini // ParTri_8 //
GSP30partr_au:22: etan nāyoginījāto % nārudro labhate sphuṭam // ParTri_10 //
GSP30partr_au:24: asyoccāre kṛte samyaṅ % mantramudrāgaṇo mahān // ParTri_11 //
GSP30partr_au:26: muhūrtaṃ smarate yas tu % cumbakenābhimudritaḥ // ParTri_12 //
GSP30partr_au:27: sa badhnāti tadā dehaṃ $ mantramudrāgaṇaṃ naraḥ &
GSP30partr_au:30: sakṣāt paśyaty asaṃdigdham % ākṛṣṭaṃ rudraśaktibhiḥ // ParTri_14 //
GSP30partr_au:32: trayeṇa mātaraḥ sarvā % yogeśvaryo mahābalāḥ // ParTri_15 //
GSP30partr_au:34: āgatya samayaṃ dattvā % bhairaveṇa pracoditāḥ // ParTri_16 //
GSP30partr_au:35: yacchanti paramāṃ siddhiṃ $ phalaṃ yad vā samīhitam &
GSP30partr_au:36: anena siddhāḥ setsyanti % sādhayanti ca mantriṇaḥ // ParTri_17 //
GSP30partr_au:37: yat kiṃcid bhairave tantre $ sarvam asmāt prasiddhyati &
GSP30partr_au:38: adṛṣṭamaṇdalo 'py evaṃ % yaḥ kaścid vetti tattvataḥ \
GSP30partr_au:39: sa siddhibhāg bhaven nityaṃ sa yogī sa ca dīkṣitaḥ // ParTri_18 //
GSP30partr_au:41: śākinīkulasāmānyo % bhaved yogaṃ vināpi hi // ParTri_19 //
GSP30partr_au:42: avidhijño vidhānajño $ jāyate yajanaṃ prati // ParTri_20 //
GSP30partr_au:44: śivo viśvādyanantāntaḥ % paraṃ śaktitrayaṃ matam // ParTri_21 //
GSP30partr_au:45: tadantar varti yat kiṃcic $ chuddhamārge vyavasthitam &
GSP30partr_au:46: aṇur viśuddham acirād % aiśvaraṃ jñānam aśnute // ParTri_22 //
GSP30partr_au:48: sarvago nirmalaḥ svacchas % tṛptaḥ svāyatanaḥ śuciḥ // ParTri_23 //
GSP30partr_au:50: tathā hṛdayabījasthaṃ % jagad etac carācaram // ParTri_24 //
GSP30partr_au:51: evaṃ yo vetti tattvena $ tasya nirvāṇagāminī &
GSP30partr_au:53: mūrdhni vaktre ca hṛdaye $ guhye mūrtau tathaiva ca &
GSP30partr_au:54: nyāsaṃ krtvā śikhāṃ baddhvā % saptaviṃśatimantritām // ParTri_26 //
GSP30partr_au:55: ekaikaṃ tu diśāṃ bandhaṃ $ daśānām api yojayet &
GSP30partr_au:56: tālatrayam purā dattvā % saśabdaṃ vighnaśāntaye // ParTri_27 //
GSP30partr_au:58: puṣpādikaṃ kramāt sarvaṃ % liṅge vā sthaṇḍile 'thavā // ParTri_28 //
GSP30partr_au:60: tatra sṛṣṭiṃ yajed vīraḥ % punar evāsanaṃ tataḥ // ParTri_29 //
GSP30partr_au:61: sṛṣṭiṃ tu sampuṭīkṛtya $ paścād yajanam ārabhet &
GSP30partr_au:64: tataḥ sugandhipuṣpais tu % yathāśaktyā samarcayet // ParTri_31 //
GSP30partr_au:65: pūjayet parayā bhaktyā $ ātmanaṃ ca nivedayet &
GSP30partr_au:66: evaṃ yajanam ākhyātam % agnikārye 'py ayaṃ vidhiḥ // ParTri_32 //
GSP30partr_au:69: hṛtpadmāntargataṃ dhyāyet somāṃśaṃ nityam abhyasyet // ParTri_33 //
GSP30partr_au:71: etad abhyāsataḥ siddhiḥ % sarvajñatvam avāpyate // ParTri_35 //
